Crest consumer base
One time buyers
11%		 Loyals
21%		 Switchers
68%
Data source: Spaeth & Hess 1989.
summary_markdown: This table outlines the consumer base of Crest, categorizing it into three distinct segments based on purchasing behavior. The largest segment comprises "Switchers," accounting for 68% of the consumer base, indicating a tendency to choose different brands. "Loyals," representing 21%, demonstrate consistent brand preference. The smallest segment is "One time buyers" at 11%, suggesting infrequent or trial purchases. This data presents a comparative structure, highlighting the relative proportions of these consumer types within Crest's market. The information is sourced from Spaeth & Hess, 1989.
